ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael: I was wishing that you would agree to go in exile by yourself... However, since I was suggesting this, I assume I am the negotiator. I would allow you

Tyrael: I was wishing that you would agree to go in exile by 
yourself... However, since I was suggesting this, I assume I am the 
negotiator. I would allow you to stay in contact with your troops, 
but your physical presence would be denied.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "WHo sent me to exile?? and at whom have I to negociate my 
> acomodation???"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael: Now we can talk. As I said, this might not please you 
very 
> > much, but neither am I hot to the idea. I was sent here to get 
> you, 
> > alive or dead. What I suggest is that you leave, in exile. You 
can 
> > still have contacts with your crew, which I do not necessarily 
> wish 
> > to see evicted, but the main thing is that you are not on Earth 
> > anymore. We will not chase you or anything, unless you come back. 
> If 
> > you wish, you can negotiate to accomodate yourself.
> > 
> > Dreadplague looked at Tyrael with a struck air, then at 
Darkangel. 
> > Her voice came out so low that only her fellow warrior could hear 
> her.
> > 
> > Dread: Is he crazy? What is he doing?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Hydras:
> > > 
> > > "Calm down, sharpclaws, I have my reasons"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > OOC: I'm back!
> > > > 
> > > > : : Darkangel/Wolfenstein/SharpClaws/Kup : :
> > > > 
> > > > Darkangel, Wolfenstein and SharpClaws all stop fighting and 
> stand 
> > > by 
> > > > their respective commanders. Wolf and Claws are somewhat 
> damaged 
> > > but 
> > > > look strong. Darkangel has severe damge done to his 
> exostructure.
> > > > 
> > > > SharpClaws: Why stand down, Hydras? They attacked us, we 
> should 
> > > > destroy them!
> > > > 
> > > > On the outskirts of the battlefield, Kup waits in truck mode. 
> He 
> > > > waits to see the results of Azure's actions.
